articles.title: Review & setlist: Dropkick Murphys come on strong, avert disaster at soggy Suffolk Downs
articles.description:
The diehards who hung out through the rain delay were rewarded with an intense turn by Ken Casey and the boys.

The post Review & setlist: Dropkick Murphys come on strong, avert disaster at soggy Suffolk Downs appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Dropkick Murphys performed at Suffolk Downs on September 6, 2025, despite heavy rain.
Ken Casey led an intense performance that energized dedicated fans during the rain delay.
The concert's success highlights Boston's vibrant music scene and community resilience.
